mechanics.condition: Object is a magic item OR is magic-imbued
mechanics.outcome: Learn object's properties, how to use them, attunement requirement, and current charge count (if any)
Learn which spells are affecting the object

mechanics.condition: Object was created by a spell
mechanics.outcome: Learn which spell created the object
Learn which spells are currently affecting the creature

description_text: You choose one object that you must touch throughout the casting of the spell. If it is a magic item or some other magic-imbued object, you learn its properties and how to use them, whether it requires attunement to use, and how many charges it has, if any. You learn whether any spells are affecting the item and what they are. If the item was created by a spell, you learn which spell created it. If you instead touch a creature throughout the casting, you learn what spells, if any, are currently affecting it.
